comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: A four and a single scull in this one.  The scull would be much quicker off the mark but the four would wear him down after a couple of hundred yard.  Great though for each to practice their starts beside each other.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Nice to see you again! Thanks for the info we've updated our records :)
